Hi,

I always assumed that JUnitCore.runClasses(...) could also run classes=
 annotated with @RunWith. Was this assumption wrong? It does not seem to wo=
rk with ClasspathSuite nor with Suite (tested with JUnit 4.6). At least, I =
don't see any console output. Should I?

confused...

Johannes
